channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Blog2Social: Social Media Auto Post & Scheduler
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Blog2Social: Social Media Auto Post & Scheduler

item.title: CVE-2023-3936|2024-08-02T07:08:50.615Z -- unknown -- blog2social%3A%20social%20media%20auto%20post%20%26%20scheduler
item.description: The Blog2Social WordPress plugin before 7.2.1 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
